channel.title: Movin shops
channel.description: How can I move the shops around different places?

item.title: Movin shops
item.dc:creator: @Pie_Lord Pie Lord
item.description:
@Pie_Lord wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg and look at the shopNPC you wanna move and look in autospawn.cfg and find the id and you should see coords next to it change it to the coords you wanna put it at.

Read full topic

item.title: Movin shops
item.dc:creator: @JBJr JBJr
item.description:
@JBJr wrote:

umm there are no coords in shops.cfg… it just has the shop number, the name, the item id, and the amount.

Read full topic

item.title: Movin shops
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

lol… thats kinda long. Just go to shops.cfg and search the npc id and change the coords.

now lets compare…

[quote=“Zaron, post:2, topic:97377”]like the NPC?, if so, you gotta have your shop first (if you need help making shops, im your man) you go into autospawn.cfg and find the NPC ID that the shop is (if you dont know, go into client.java and search for “Mage of” without quotes and find it…

Once youve found it, change the coords of the NPC shop that you have to the ones you want… if this is not what you want, plz post back telling me what you want because shops ae easy once you get the hang of it…[/quote]

and…

Frell:

lol… thats kinda long. Just go to shops.cfg and search the npc id and change the coords.

Read full topic

item.title: Movin shops
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

like the NPC?, if so, you gotta have your shop first (if you need help making shops, im your man) you go into autospawn.cfg and find the NPC ID that the shop is (if you dont know, go into client.java and search for “Mage of” without quotes and find it…

Once youve found it, change the coords of the NPC shop that you have to the ones you want… if this is not what you want, plz post back telling me what you want because shops ae easy once you get the hang of it…

Read full topic
